Package ru.alvisid.pacs.service.impl

Class ActionServiceImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • ru.alvisid.pacs.service.AbstractService<ActionRepository,​Action>
      • ru.alvisid.pacs.service.impl.ActionServiceImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ActionService, TypicalService<Action>
    @Service
public class ActionServiceImpl
extends AbstractService<ActionRepository,​Action>
implements ActionService
    Implementation of the ActionService interface. Extends AbstractService and AbstractCachedService functionality.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Glushkov Evgeniy
    See Also:
    ActionService, AbstractService

      • ActionServiceImpl

        @Autowired
public ActionServiceImpl​(ActionRepository repository,
                         PointPermitService pointPermitService,
                         EmployeeService employeeService,
                         PointActionService pointActionService)
        Constructs new ActionServiceImpl and sets a specified action's repository implementation to the superclass's repository field, sets pointPermitService, employeeService and controlPointService fields.
        Parameters:
        repository - the specified action's repository implementation.
        pointPermitService - the specified PointPermitService's repository implementation.
        employeeService - the specified EmployeeService's repository implementation.
        pointActionService - the specified PointActionService's repository implementation.
